 == _AIIDE 2011_ ==

 === Info ===
  * *Hosted by:* University of Alberta
  * *Registration:* Email "mburo (AT) cs (DOT) ualberta (DOT) ca" with "SCAI2011 ENTRY" as the subject. You MUST specify "SCAI2011 ENTRY" as the subject.
  * *Info:* http://skatgame.net/mburo/sc2011/

 === Binaries ===
  * *Version:* The latest BWAPI binary available as of July 1st, 2011. No exceptions.
  * *Operating System:* Windows XP

 === Dates ===
  * *Registration Deadline:* July 1st, 2011
  * *Submission Deadline:* July 31st, 2011
  * *Competition:* August 8th to August 12th, 2011

  _More details will be available soon._
